page.title: 03LANDSCAPE
page.content:
{ {Old Houses of Bishops Nympton {By Georgina and Lynsey }
We chose this project because we thought that it would be very interesting, good fun and very worth while. The oldest houses are: {The Retreat, Island House,Hills View, {East Rock, Vicaradge View,Thornton, {Barnton View and Rockley.}They are all made of cob.{Thornton}is falling apart because it is so old. They are all 3-400 years old. We also found out that{Hills View {used to be a}pub called{Masons Arms. { The Retreat, Island House,Vicarage {View}and{Barton View}are all still thatched.These are the houses that are slated,{Hills View,Thornton}and {Rockley.
